languages.text: "Я молился, Ваша Светлость. После того, как вы помиловали меня, я много молюсь". {n}Холеное лицо осунулось, скулы проступили тверже, и черты вчерашнего сытого карьериста обрели иконописное благородство.{/n} "А когда эти подонки достали оружие, я счел неприемлемым остаться в стороне. Может, меня и сочли скверным офицером, но скверным бойцом не называли никогда. Рад, что вы в порядке. Сегодня я помолюсь Богу-Императору за ваше здравие".

"I was praying, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. Ever since you spared me, I have been praying a lot." {n}Hrotko's groomed face now looks haggard. His cheekbones jut out, and his former well-off appearance has taken on an air of noble piety.{/n} "And when I saw those vermin pull out their weapons, I considered it unacceptable to stand aside. I may have been found a bad officer, but not once have I been called a bad fighter. I am glad to see you in one piece. Today, I will be praying to the God-Emperor for your health."
languages.original_text: "Я молился, Ваша Светлость. После того, как вы помиловали меня, я много молюсь". {n}Холеное лицо осунулось, скулы проступили тверже, и черты вчерашнего сытого карьериста обрели иконописное благородство.{/n} "А когда эти подонки достали оружие, я счел неприемлемым остаться в стороне. Может, меня и сочли скверным офицером, но скверным бойцом не называли никогда. Рад, что вы в порядке. Сегодня я помолюсь Богу-Императору за ваше здравие".

I may have been found a bad officer, but not once have I been called a bad fighter. I am glad to see you in one piece. Today, I will be praying to the God-Emperor for your health."

languages.text: "Ich habe gebetet, Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}. Seitdem Ihr mich verschont habt, habe ich fleißig spioniert." {n}Hrotkos gepflegtes Gesicht wirkt nun ausgezehrt. Seine Wangenknochen stehen hervor und sein einst so begütertes Äußeres verströmt einen Hauch adeliger Frömmigkeit.{/n} "Und als ich sah, dass dieses Gesindel seine Waffen zieht, hielt ich es für inakzeptabel, nicht einzugreifen. Ich mag ein schlechter Offizier gewesen sein, aber ein schlechter Kämpfer war ich nie. Ich freue mich, dass Ihr unversehrt seid. Ich werde vor dem Gottimperator heute für Eure Gesundheit beten."
languages.original_text: "I was praying, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. Ever since you spared me, I have been praying a lot." {n}Hrotko's groomed face now looks haggard. His cheekbones jut out, and his former well-off appearance has taken on an air of noble piety.{/n} "And when I saw those vermin pull out their weapons, I considered it unacceptable to stand aside. I may have been found a bad officer, but not once have I been called a bad fighter. I am glad to see you in one piece. Today, I will be praying to the God-Emperor for your health."

Seine Wangenknochen stehen hervor und sein einst so begütertes Äußeres verströmt einen Hauch adeliger Frömmigkeit.{/n} "Und als ich sah, dass dieses Gesindel seine Waffen zieht, hielt ich es für inakzeptabel, nicht einzugreifen. Ich mag ein schlechter Offizier gewesen sein, aber ein schlechter Kämpfer war ich nie. Ich freue mich, dass Ihr unversehrt seid. Ich werde vor dem Gottimperator heute für Eure Gesundheit beten."

languages.text: « Je priais, Votre Seigneurie. Depuis que vous m'avez épargné, je passe mon temps à prier. » {n}Le visage d'ordinaire soigné de Hrotko est complètement hagard. Son apparence, qui exsudait autrefois l'opulence, lui donne désormais un air de noble piété.{/n} « Et quand j'ai vu ces vermines sortir leurs armes, j'ai considéré qu'il était inacceptable pour moi de rester à l'écart. J'ai peut-être été un mauvais officier, mais personne n'a jamais dit de moi que j'étais mauvais combattant. Je suis heureux de vous voir en un seul morceau. Aujourd'hui, j'adresserai une prière à l'Empereur-Dieu pour votre santé. »
languages.original_text: "I was praying, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. Ever since you spared me, I have been praying a lot." {n}Hrotko's groomed face now looks haggard. His cheekbones jut out, and his former well-off appearance has taken on an air of noble piety.{/n} "And when I saw those vermin pull out their weapons, I considered it unacceptable to stand aside. I may have been found a bad officer, but not once have I been called a bad fighter. I am glad to see you in one piece. Today, I will be praying to the God-Emperor for your health."

traits.locale_text: « Je priais, Votre Seigneurie. Depuis que vous m'avez épargné, je passe mon temps à prier. » {n}Le visage d'ordinaire soigné de Hrotko est complètement hagard. Son apparence, qui exsudait autrefois l'opulence, lui donne désormais un air de noble piété.{/n} « Et quand j'ai vu ces vermines sortir leurs armes, j'ai considéré qu'il était inacceptable pour moi de rester à l'écart. J'ai peut-être été un mauvais officier, mais personne n'a jamais dit de moi que j'étais mauvais combattant. Je suis heureux de vous voir en un seul morceau. Aujourd'hui, j'adresserai une prière à l'Empereur-Dieu pour votre santé. »

languages.text: «Estaba rezando, mi{mf|lord|lady}. Desde que me perdonó la vida, he estado rezando mucho». {n}El cuidado rostro de Hrotko refleja su tensión. Tiene los pómulos salidos y su anterior aspecto acaudalado ha dado paso a un aire de noble piedad.{/n} «Al ver que esas alimañas sacaban las armas, consideré inaceptable permanecer al margen. Se me podrá acusar de ser mal oficial, pero nunca de ser mal combatiente. Me alegro de que siga de una pieza. Hoy rezaré al Dios Emperador por su salud».
languages.original_text: "I was praying, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. Ever since you spared me, I have been praying a lot." {n}Hrotko's groomed face now looks haggard. His cheekbones jut out, and his former well-off appearance has taken on an air of noble piety.{/n} "And when I saw those vermin pull out their weapons, I considered it unacceptable to stand aside. I may have been found a bad officer, but not once have I been called a bad fighter. I am glad to see you in one piece. Today, I will be praying to the God-Emperor for your health."

traits.locale_text: «Estaba rezando, mi{mf|lord|lady}. Desde que me perdonó la vida, he estado rezando mucho». {n}El cuidado rostro de Hrotko refleja su tensión. Tiene los pómulos salidos y su anterior aspecto acaudalado ha dado paso a un aire de noble piedad.{/n} «Al ver que esas alimañas sacaban las armas, consideré inaceptable permanecer al margen. Se me podrá acusar de ser mal oficial, pero nunca de ser mal combatiente. Me alegro de que siga de una pieza. Hoy rezaré al Dios Emperador por su salud».

languages.text: 「祈っていたのです、陛下。あなたが私を生かしてくださって以来、私はよく祈っているのです」{n}フロトコの整った顔は、今ではやつれたように見える。頬骨がせり出し、かつての恵まれた外見からは経験な信仰心が滲みだしている。{/n}「そして、あの外注どもが武器を取り出すのを見たとき、傍観していることは許されないのだと考えたのです。士官として失格だと言われたことはあれど、戦士として失格だと言われたことは一度もない。あなたがご無事で何よりです。今日は神帝陛下に、あなたのご健勝を祈るとしましょう」
languages.original_text: "I was praying, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. Ever since you spared me, I have been praying a lot." {n}Hrotko's groomed face now looks haggard. His cheekbones jut out, and his former well-off appearance has taken on an air of noble piety.{/n} "And when I saw those vermin pull out their weapons, I considered it unacceptable to stand aside. I may have been found a bad officer, but not once have I been called a bad fighter. I am glad to see you in one piece. Today, I will be praying to the God-Emperor for your health."

traits.locale_text: 「祈っていたのです、陛下。あなたが私を生かしてくださって以来、私はよく祈っているのです」{n}フロトコの整った顔は、今ではやつれたように見える。頬骨がせり出し、かつての恵まれた外見からは経験な信仰心が滲みだしている。{/n}「そして、あの外注どもが武器を取り出すのを見たとき、傍観していることは許されないのだと考えたのです。士官として失格だと言われたことはあれど、戦士として失格だと言われたことは一度もない。あなたがご無事で何よりです。今日は神帝陛下に、あなたのご健勝を祈るとしましょう」

languages.text: “因为我在祈祷，大人。自从您宽恕了我之后，我就一直在祈祷。”{n}赫洛卡精心修整过的脸看起来很憔悴，颧骨高耸。原本富态的脸上，如今带着一股高贵的虔诚。{/n}“当我看到那些人渣掏出武器的时候，我认为我绝对不能袖手旁观。或许会有人说我是个不称职的军官，但从来没人说过我是个不称职的战士。我很高兴您安然无恙，今天，我要为您的健康向神皇祈祷。”
languages.original_text: "I was praying, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. Ever since you spared me, I have been praying a lot." {n}Hrotko's groomed face now looks haggard. His cheekbones jut out, and his former well-off appearance has taken on an air of noble piety.{/n} "And when I saw those vermin pull out their weapons, I considered it unacceptable to stand aside. I may have been found a bad officer, but not once have I been called a bad fighter. I am glad to see you in one piece. Today, I will be praying to the God-Emperor for your health."

traits.locale_text: “因为我在祈祷，大人。自从您宽恕了我之后，我就一直在祈祷。”{n}赫洛卡精心修整过的脸看起来很憔悴，颧骨高耸。原本富态的脸上，如今带着一股高贵的虔诚。{/n}“当我看到那些人渣掏出武器的时候，我认为我绝对不能袖手旁观。或许会有人说我是个不称职的军官，但从来没人说过我是个不称职的战士。我很高兴您安然无恙，今天，我要为您的健康向神皇祈祷。”

languages.text: "Dua ediyordum {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri. Beni bağışladığınızdan beri sık sık dua ediyorum." {n}Hrotko'nun bakımlı yüzü artık oldukça bitkin görünüyor. Elmacık kemikleri dışarı çıkmış ve geçmişteki varlıklı görünümünün yerini asil bir dindarlık havası almış.{/n} "Bu haşerelerin silahlarını çektiklerini gördüğümde geri durmanın kabul edilemez olduğuna kanaat getirdim. Kötü bir subay olarak değerlendirilmiş olabilirim ama daha önce kimse bana kötü bir savaşçı olduğumu söylemedi. Sizi tek parça hâlinde gördüğüme çok mutluyum. Bugün Tanrı İmparator'a sağlığınız için dua edeceğim."
languages.original_text: "I was praying, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. Ever since you spared me, I have been praying a lot." {n}Hrotko's groomed face now looks haggard. His cheekbones jut out, and his former well-off appearance has taken on an air of noble piety.{/n} "And when I saw those vermin pull out their weapons, I considered it unacceptable to stand aside. I may have been found a bad officer, but not once have I been called a bad fighter. I am glad to see you in one piece. Today, I will be praying to the God-Emperor for your health."
